message.entry: Invalid planner type for SbplInterface.PlannerType. Choices are: {0}.
Cannot open the given map file. Please make sure you give the right path and correct cfg file.
The resolutions of map and mprim are different. Please make sure resolutions are the same in the mapfile and mprimfile.
Cannot open the given motion primitive file. Please make sure you give the right path and correct mprim file.
Start/goal state falls outside of the bounds of the defined state space. Please choose a start/goal state that x falls in the range between 0 and {0} and y falls in the range between 0 and {1}.
Expected the vector to be [x y theta]. The input size should be [1 3].
No solution is found by SBPL in the limit time.
